name: OneLineHero
description:
Supports English

Are you usually lucky? Then try your luck.

The success and failure of this adventure depends on your fortune and your destiny

[Main features of game]

- Meet with over 40 cute or fearsome monsters
- Big, powerful bosses per stage
- Simple battle system that stands out in psychology
- Unique and cute 3d and 2d unusual combination!
- Stage configuration to enjoy in a short time

Enjoy it!

If you have any questions, please feel free to visit our blog.
https://nopyesg.tistory.com/
